definitions.text: a deposit of personal property as security for a debt
someone accepted for membership but not yet fully admitted to the group
a drink in honor of or to the health of a person or event
a binding commitment to do or give or refrain from something
examples: an assurance of help when needed
signed a pledge never to reveal the secret
I pledge that I will honor my wife

definitions.text: pay (an amount of money) as a contribution to a charity or service, especially at regular intervals
examples: I pledged $10 a month to my favorite radio station
Let us toast the birthday girl!
Let's drink to the New Year

definitions.text: bind or secure by a pledge
